w:r.w:t: AI-POWERED RESUME SCREENING SaaS
Complete Technical Architecture & Implementation Blueprint
World-Class FAANG-Competitive Platform - Version 2.0
EXECUTIVE SUMMARY

This document outlines the complete architecture for building a world-class AI-Powered Resume Screening SaaS that competes with Greenhouse, Lever, and Workable while introducing 8 revolutionary features they don't offer.
Mission: Transform recruitment from manual, bias-prone processes into intelligent, data-driven systems identifying the best talent with unprecedented accuracy and fairness.
Our Competitive Moat
Real-time skill verification through GitHub deep-dive, live code analysis, and blockchain-authenticated portfolios
Predictive success scoring using ML models trained on 100,000+ historical hiring outcomes (85%+ accuracy)
Video interview AI analyzing speech, sentiment, and non-verbal cues with ethical bias auditing
Anti-bias AI with continuous fairness monitoring and explainable decisions (SHAP/LIME)
Live coding platform with auto-evaluation, plagiarism detection, and 10,000+ curated problems
Blockchain credential verification partnering with universities for instant, tamper-proof validation

1. TECHNICAL ARCHITECTURE & SYSTEM DESIGN
Cloud-native microservices architecture designed to scale from 100 to 100 million candidates without re-architecture. Handles 100,000+ concurrent users with sub-200ms latency.
1.1 System Architecture Overview
Presentation Layer: Next.js 15 (App Router, Server Components), React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind + Shadcn UI
API Gateway: Kong with rate limiting (tiered: 100/1000/10k per hour), JWT authentication, request routing
Service Mesh: Istio for mTLS, distributed tracing (Jaeger), traffic management, circuit breakers
Microservices: Node.js 22 (NestJS), Python 3.12 (FastAPI for AI), Go 1.22 (analytics)
Message Queue: Kafka (event streaming), RabbitMQ (task queues), AWS SQS (reliability)
Cache: Redis Cluster (5 nodes, LRU eviction, 99.9% uptime, sub-1ms latency)
Databases: PostgreSQL 16 (relational + pgvector), MongoDB Atlas (documents), Neo4j (graphs), Pinecone (vectors)
Search: Elasticsearch 8 with relevance tuning, Algolia for instant candidate search (<50ms)
Storage: AWS S3 (versioning, lifecycle), CloudFront CDN (200+ edge locations, sub-100ms delivery)
Orchestration: Kubernetes on EKS with HPA, blue-green deployments, self-healing
1.2 Core Microservices
Authentication Service: Auth0 integration, MFA (TOTP, SMS, biometric), SSO (SAML, OAuth2, OIDC), RBAC
Resume Ingestion Service: Apache Tika (PDF/DOCX parsing), Tesseract OCR, metadata extraction
AI Orchestration Service: Multi-model routing (GPT-4o, Claude, Gemini), prompt versioning, cost optimization
Verification Service: GitHub/GitLab/Bitbucket APIs, code quality analysis (SonarQube metrics), contribution graphs
Scoring Engine: Custom XGBoost models (85%+ accuracy), weighted algorithms, real-time bias detection
Video Analysis Service: Whisper Large v3 (transcription), Hume AI (sentiment, 28 emotions), facial analysis
Assessment Platform: Monaco editor, sandboxed Docker execution, auto-grading, 10k+ problem library
Workflow Engine: Interview scheduling (timezone-aware), email automation (SendGrid), pipeline management
Notification Service: Multi-channel (email, SMS via Twilio, push, in-app), template engine, delivery tracking
Analytics Service: Real-time dashboards (Grafana), Snowflake data warehouse, scheduled reports
Compliance Service: GDPR/CCPA automation, immutable audit logs (7-year retention), data lifecycle
2. REVOLUTIONARY FEATURE SET
Eight world-first capabilities creating an insurmountable competitive moat:
2.1 Multi-Source Skill Verification Engine (UNIQUE)
GitHub Intelligence System
Deep Code Analysis: Examine commits for code quality, design patterns, algorithm complexity, best practices
Contribution Graph: Track coding velocity, consistency over time, collaboration patterns, skill evolution
Repository Quality: Differentiate original work from forks, tutorial repos (tutorial hell detection)
Language Proficiency: Measure actual lines written, complexity, recency across 50+ languages
Open Source Impact: Quantify contributions to major projects (Linux, React), community engagement, code reviews
Portfolio Authentication
Live Demo Verification: Automated testing of deployed projects to confirm functionality
Code Ownership Proof: Analyze commit timestamps, coding style consistency, GitHub signatures
Blockchain Attestation: Issue NFT-based certificates for verified portfolio items (Ethereum/Polygon)
Plagiarism Detection: Compare against 10M+ tutorial repos, Stack Overflow, code snippet databases
Cross-Platform Validation
Stack Overflow: Reputation score, answer quality, topic expertise, community trust (top 5% = expert)
Technical Blogging: Analyze Medium, Dev.to content for depth, originality, engagement
Competitive Programming: LeetCode (rating, problem-solving patterns), HackerRank, Codeforces
Conference Speaking: Identify talks, workshops, thought leadership contributions
2.2 Predictive Success Modeling (WORLD-FIRST)
Performance Correlation: XGBoost trained on client's historical data (100k+ outcomes, 85%+ accuracy)
Retention Prediction: 2-year retention probability based on career patterns, compensation alignment
Growth Potential Index: Identify high learning velocity through GitHub trends, skill acquisition rate
Team Chemistry Score: Predict cultural fit using communication style, collaboration patterns (OCEAN personality)
Ramp-Up Time: Estimate time-to-productivity based on skill overlap, domain experience
2.3 Video Interview AI Analysis (REVOLUTIONARY)
Speech Analysis: Whisper v3 transcription (99%+ accuracy), technical vocabulary measurement, clarity scoring
Sentiment Detection: Hume AI for 28 emotions, authenticity scoring, stress/confidence indicators
Non-Verbal Cues: Eye contact, posture, gestures (with fairness auditing - advisory only, not decisive)
Red Flag Detection: Inconsistencies between resume claims and interview responses
CRITICAL: All analysis includes bias detection. Non-verbal cues used only for coaching, never hiring decisions.
2.4 Live Coding Assessment Platform
Cloud IDE: Monaco editor (VS Code engine) with IntelliSense for 50+ languages
Real-Time Collaboration: Live cursors, shared terminal, instant feedback between interviewer/candidate
Sandboxed Execution: Docker containers with resource limits (CPU, memory, network isolation)
Auto-Evaluation: AI judges correctness, time/space complexity, readability, edge cases
Plagiarism Detection: Compare against GitHub, LeetCode, Stack Overflow, known solutions (fingerprinting)
Problem Library: 10,000+ curated challenges by difficulty/domain, custom test cases, replay analysis
2.5 Blockchain Credential Verification (FIRST-TO-MARKET)
Digital Diplomas: NFT-based degrees on Ethereum/Polygon with university cryptographic signatures
Instant Verification: One-click validation reducing background checks from weeks to seconds
Certification Tracking: AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, professional licenses (CPA, PE, RN) via blockchain
Revocation Registry: Track invalidated credentials (expelled students, revoked licenses)
Privacy-Preserving: Zero-knowledge proofs to verify without revealing sensitive details
2.6 Anti-Bias AI & Fairness Engine
Blind Screening: Auto-redact names, photos, addresses, graduation years, gender pronouns during initial review
Adversarial Debiasing: Neural networks removing correlations with protected attributes
Fairness Metrics: Track disparate impact, equal opportunity difference, demographic parity
Explainable AI: SHAP/LIME explanations for every ranking decision
Bias Detection Dashboard: Real-time alerts when patterns deviate from fairness thresholds
Regular Audits: Quarterly third-party bias audits, annual public transparency reports
3. AI & MACHINE LEARNING PIPELINE
3.1 Multi-Model Strategy
Use optimal AI model for each task:
Resume Parsing: Claude Sonnet 4 (200k context handles entire resumes + JDs)
Skill Extraction: Gemini 2.0 Flash (fast, cost-effective structured JSON output)
Code Review: GPT-4o (best reasoning for complex technical analysis)
Video Transcription: Whisper Large v3 (99%+ accuracy across accents)
Sentiment: Hume AI / Fine-tuned BERT (specialized for interviews, 28 emotions)
Embeddings: text-embedding-3-large (3072-dim, highest quality semantic search)
Success Prediction: Custom XGBoost (85%+ accuracy, trained on client data, explainable)
3.2 Custom ML Models
Success Prediction: XGBoost ensemble on 100k+ outcomes, features: skill match, GitHub activity, education
Skill Match Transformer: BERT understanding synonyms (React = React.js), related concepts (Docker → K8s)
Bias Detection Network: Adversarial autoencoder removing protected attribute correlations
Resume Quality Classifier: CNN identifying professional formatting, quantified achievements
Candidate Clustering: K-means discovering segments (Career Switchers, Rapid Learners, Specialists)
3.3 RAG System
Vector Database: Pinecone with 3072-dim embeddings (resumes, JDs, transcripts, company knowledge)
Hybrid Search: Semantic (cosine similarity) + keyword (BM25) + metadata filters
Context Injection: Top-5 relevant documents augment AI prompts for personalization
Auto-Update: Daily re-embedding pipeline, incremental updates for changed documents
4. SECURITY ARCHITECTURE & COMPLIANCE
4.1 Data Protection
Encryption at Rest: AES-256-GCM for all databases, S3, backups. Separate keys per tenant
Encryption in Transit: TLS 1.3, HSTS, certificate pinning (mobile), perfect forward secrecy
Field-Level Encryption: PII (SSN, DOB, salary) with AWS KMS, separate DEKs per field
Key Management: AWS KMS with 90-day rotation, HSM-backed for SOC 2
Data Residency: Multi-region (US, EU, Asia) for GDPR, data localization compliance
Secure Deletion: Cryptographic erasure for GDPR 'Right to be Forgotten' (delete encryption keys)
4.2 Authentication & Authorization
MFA: TOTP, SMS, biometric (Touch ID/Face ID), hardware keys (YubiKey/WebAuthn)
SSO: SAML 2.0, OAuth2, OpenID Connect (Okta, Azure AD, Google Workspace)
RBAC: Granular permissions (Admin, Owner, Recruiter, Hiring Manager, Interviewer, Viewer)
ABAC: Context-aware rules (IP whitelist, device trust, time-based, geo-fencing)
Session Management: JWT (15-min expiry), refresh tokens (7-day), device fingerprinting
Zero Trust: Never trust, always verify. Micro-segmentation, least privilege
4.3 Application Security
Input Validation: Zod/Yup schemas, DOMPurify sanitization, parameterized queries
Rate Limiting: Token bucket per user/IP/endpoint, Redis distributed rate limiter
DDoS Protection: Cloudflare WAF, Layer 7 filtering, geo-blocking
Dependency Scanning: Snyk daily scans, auto-PRs for patches (critical <24h, high <7days)
Security Headers: CSP, X-Frame-Options: DENY, strict CORS, SameSite cookies
Penetration Testing: Quarterly by third-parties (Cobalt), HackerOne bug bounty ($500-$10k)
4.4 Compliance
SOC 2 Type II: Annual audit (security, availability, confidentiality, privacy)
GDPR: DPAs, consent management, right to access/deletion/portability, breach notification <72h
CCPA: Do Not Sell disclosure, opt-out mechanism, consumer rights portal
EEOC: Adverse impact analysis, 4/5ths rule, 1-year recordkeeping
Audit Logging: Immutable logs in CloudWatch, 7-year retention, tamper detection
5. SCALABILITY STRATEGY
Designed to scale from 100 to 100 million candidates:
5.1 Horizontal Scaling
Stateless Services: All microservices stateless for unlimited scaling
Auto-Scaling: K8s HPA based on CPU, memory, request rate, custom metrics
Load Balancing: ALB with health checks, sticky sessions, WebSocket support
Database Sharding: PostgreSQL partitioned by tenant_id hash, 10k candidates/shard
Read Replicas: 2-5 PostgreSQL replicas for analytics without impacting primary
5.2 Caching (Multi-Layer)
Browser: Service Workers (offline), IndexedDB (large datasets), Cache API (static assets)
CDN: CloudFront 200+ edge locations, 95%+ hit rate, 1-week TTL
Application: Redis Cluster (LRU, 99.9% uptime, sub-1ms latency)
Database: PostgreSQL shared_buffers (25% RAM), query result caching
5.3 Async Processing
Job Queues: BullMQ (Redis) for background tasks, priority queues (critical/high/normal/low)
Worker Pools: Dedicated workers for parsing, AI, emails, separate scaling
Batch Processing: Group 100 resumes for AI cost optimization
Circuit Breakers: 50% error rate triggers open, 30s timeout, half-open testing
6. DATA ARCHITECTURE
PostgreSQL 16: Users, jobs, applications (JSONB for flexibility, pgvector for embeddings, partitioning)
MongoDB Atlas: Resume text, AI results, transcripts (flexible schema, sharding by tenant_id)
Neo4j Aura: Relationship graphs (referrals, skill taxonomy, career paths)
Pinecone: 3072-dim embeddings for semantic search, <50ms queries
Backup: Daily full, hourly incremental, 30-day retention, cross-region replication (1hr RPO, 4hr RTO)
7. INTEGRATION ECOSYSTEM (50+ Tools)
ATS: Greenhouse, Lever, Workday (bi-directional sync, webhooks)
Calendar: Google, Outlook, Calendly (OAuth, free/busy, auto-scheduling)
Video: Zoom, Teams, Meet (one-click rooms, recording, transcripts)
Communication: Slack, Teams (notifications, approvals), SendGrid/SES (email)
Background Checks: Checkr, HireRight (automated initiation, FCRA compliance)
Developer APIs: REST, GraphQL, webhooks (30+ events), SDKs (JS, Python, Ruby, PHP, Go)
8. USER EXPERIENCE DESIGN
Speed: <200ms perceived latency, optimistic updates, skeleton screens, 60fps animations
Recruiter Dashboard: Kanban board, smart filters, bulk actions, real-time activity feed
Candidate Profile: 360° view (resume, GitHub, videos, assessments), AI insights, comparison mode
Analytics: Time-to-hire, cost-per-hire, source effectiveness, AI performance metrics
Mobile Apps: Native iOS/Android, offline support, push notifications, voice commands
9. MONETIZATION STRATEGY
Free: $0 (10 candidates/mo, 1 user) - viral adoption
Starter: $99/mo (50 candidates/mo, GitHub verification, 3 users)
Professional: $499/mo (500 candidates/mo, Full AI, video analysis, 10 users)
Business: $1,999/mo (5000 candidates/mo, Predictive ML, API, 50 users)
Enterprise: Custom (Unlimited, SSO, 99.99% SLA, dedicated CSM, custom ML models)
Revenue Streams: Subscriptions (70%), usage-based (20%), professional services (5%), marketplace (3%), data insights (2%)
10. 24-MONTH ROADMAP
Phase 1 (M1-4): Foundation - Team (8), infrastructure, auth, MVP (resume upload, basic parsing, matching)
Phase 2 (M5-8): Core AI - Gemini/Claude/GPT integration, GitHub verification, Beta (20 customers)
Phase 3 (M9-12): Advanced - ML models, video analysis, live coding, integrations (Greenhouse, Slack, Zoom)
Phase 4 (M13-16): Scale - Auto-scaling, SOC 2 Type I, blockchain credentials, 200 customers, $50k MRR
Phase 5 (M17-20): Enterprise - SSO, SCIM, SOC 2 Type II, APIs, 1000 customers, $400k MRR, Series A ($12M)
Phase 6 (M21-24): Market Leader - Proprietary features, global expansion, 5000 customers, $2M MRR, Series B ready
11. COMPLIANCE
GDPR: DPAs, consent, right to access/deletion/portability, breach notification <72h, DPO
CCPA: Do Not Sell, opt-out, consumer requests (45-day SLA)
EEOC: Adverse impact analysis, 4/5ths rule, 1-year records
FCRA: Disclosure, authorization, pre-adverse action notices
ADA: WCAG 2.2 Level AA, screen reader, keyboard nav, captions
12. SUCCESS METRICS & KPIs
Product: AI accuracy 95%+, success prediction 85%+, bias <0.8 DI ratio, p95 latency <500ms, 99.9% uptime
User: DAU/MAU 40%+, session 20+ min, 50+ profiles viewed/week, NPS 50+, churn <3% monthly
Business: MRR growth 15%+ monthly, CAC <$1k, LTV:CAC 5:1+, NRR 120%+, win rate 25%+, ACV $6k+
13. TEAM STRUCTURE
Year 1 (15 people): Engineering (8), Product (2), Sales/Marketing (3), Ops (2)
Year 2 (40 people): +12 Engineering, +3 Product, +7 Sales, +3 Marketing, +3 Customer Success
14. FINANCIAL PROJECTIONS
Year 1: $600k ARR (200 customers), $2.5M expenses, $160k/month burn, $3M seed
Year 2: $4.8M ARR (1000 customers), $6M expenses, Series A $12M @ $50M valuation
Year 3: $15M ARR (3000 customers), $10M expenses, profitability path, Series B ready
15. RISK ANALYSIS & MITIGATION
Technical Risk: AI hallucinations → Multi-model validation, human-in-loop for critical decisions
Security Risk: Data breach → Defense-in-depth, encryption, SOC 2, pen testing, incident response
Compliance Risk: Discrimination lawsuits → Continuous bias auditing, explainable AI, legal review
Market Risk: Competition from Greenhouse/Lever → Proprietary features they can't copy (blockchain, ML)
Scaling Risk: Performance degradation → Proactive load testing, auto-scaling, multi-region
Talent Risk: Key person dependency → Documentation, knowledge sharing, succession planning
CONCLUSION

This AI-Powered Resume Screening SaaS represents a paradigm shift in talent acquisition. By combining cutting-edge AI, rigorous verification, and ethical fairness, we will build the platform that defines the next decade of recruiting technology.
Our 8 world-first features create defensible competitive advantages that established players cannot quickly replicate. The 24-month roadmap balances ambitious innovation with pragmatic execution.
With proper execution, this platform will achieve:
$15M ARR by Year 3
85%+ candidate success prediction accuracy
10x faster resume screening than manual processes
Measurably fairer hiring outcomes across all demographics
Let's build the future of talent intelligence.
